infBound¶

fitAlgs.boundFunc.infBound(base=0)[source]¶

Boundary excess of inf when over bounds

Parameters

base (float, optional) – The cost at the boundary. Default 0

Returns

cost – Calculates the cost of exceeding the bounday using the parameters and the boundaries, and returns the cost.

Return type

function

Examples

>>> cst = infBound(base = 160)
>>> cst([0.5, 2], [(0, 1), (0, 5)])
160
>>> cst([0.5, 7], [(0, 1), (0, 5)])
inf
